chinese: 2蜗牛；迟钝的人 以.捉蜗牛；缓慢移动
english: snail

chinese: 一只小蜗牛在爬树。
english: A small snail is climbing a tree

chinese: 几路口；连接，接合
english: junction

chinese: 在这两条公路的交叉路口左拐。
english: Turn left at the junction of the two highways

chinese: I.构成，组成
english: constitute

chinese: 面包、牛肉、芝士和沙拉组成了一个完美的汉堡。
english: Bread, beef, cheese and salad constitute the perfect burger

chinese: V. 告知收到；承认（属实）；认可（权威或地位）
english: acknowledge

chinese: “已收到。我们会马上烤面包。”
english: Acknowledged. We will bake the bread soon

chinese: n.排，行1划（船等）
english: row

chinese: 这里有四排座位。
english: There are four rows of seats

chinese: ad）.可理解的，明白易懂的
english: intelligible

chinese: 我认为你应该能理解这些简单的数学问题。
english: I think these simple math problems should be intelligible to you

chinese: n.开发商，开发者
english: developer

chinese: 开发商买下了这块地，打算在上面修建购物商场。
english: The developer bought the land with plans to build a shopping mall on it

chinese: n.被任命者，被提名的人，代名人
english: nominee

chinese: 年度最佳员工奖将颁给这些提名者之一。
english: The best worker of the year will go to one of these nominees

chinese: n. 偶像
english: idol

chinese: 粉丝们在见到他们的偶像时尖叫了起来。
english: The fans screamed when they saw their idol

chinese: v.抓佳，抓取 n.抓取
english: grab

chinese: 婴儿喜欢抓住你的手指。
english: Babies love to grab your fingers

chinese: n.忠诚；忠心耿耿
english: loyalty

chinese: 狗狗的忠诚应该得到赞扬。
english: That dog's loyalty should be acclaimed

chinese: D.角度，观点
english: perspective

chinese: 他从不同的角度分析了共享单车的利弊。
english: He analyzed the advantages and disadvantages of sharing bikes from different perspectives

chinese: v安顿；定居；解决；调停
english: settle

chinese: 他给自己建了一所房子，并决定在那里安顿下
english: He built himself a house and decided to settle there

chinese: n. 球形把手，旋钮，圆形突出物
english: knob

chinese: 我们把”请勿打扰”的牌子放到了球形门把手上，所以人们知道他们不可以进来。
english: We put the do not disturb sign on our door knob, so people know they should stay out

chinese: n. 打针；注射，注入
english: injection

chinese: 医生正在给病人打针。
english: The doctor is giving an injection to the patient

chinese: 几.公开（性），公众的关注；宣传
english: publicity

chinese: 他总是上电视，得到了很多公众的注意。
english: He gets a lot of publicity, he's always on TV
